shop.name: 99 Cent Fresh Pizza
shop.snippet_text:
I say their crust is better then 43rd St.'s $.99 pizza.
The sauce and cheese part is as good. 
 more spacious restaurant too

shop.name: 2 Bros Pizza
shop.snippet_text: Place is really small - but pizza is really good! For only a dollar you get a good slice.  No it's not the best pizza in NYC but it's the best you can get...

shop.name: 99 Cents Fresh Pizza
shop.snippet_text: GREAT 1$ pizza!! What else can you say! Open 24/7 and greasy just they way you want it!
